last_episode_to_air.name: Super Humor
last_episode_to_air.overview: Timmy wishes to be a superhero, and tries out different powers, like talking to animals and super-strength. Finally, he chooses to be Turbo Timmy! He fights a 3-headed monster. Then he asks for super-vision, and Cosmo and Wanda bring him back home and Timmy ends up watching TV with his parents.

name: The Fairly OddParents: Oh Yeah!
overview: The Fairly OddParents originally aired as a mini-series of 7-minute shorts on the Oh Yeah! Cartoons showcase. The series ran from September 4, 1998 to March 23, 2001. The last short aired a week before the official series premiere. Each short is available on DVD. The episode "The Fairly Odd Parents!" is the pilot of the series which showcase the debut appearances of Timmy Turner, Cosmo, Wanda and Vicky. It is also the shortest season in terms of episode time and season time total, with each short being around 7 minutes long.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: The short that started it all! Abused by his evil babysitter Vicky, 10-year old Timmy Turner gets unexpected help from two swinging, comical fairy godparents.
